metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21240 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
httplib2 is a comprehensive HTTP client library for Python. In httplib2before version 0.19.0, a malicious server which responds with long seriesof "\xa0" characters in the "www-authenticate" header may cause Denial ofService (CPU burn while parsing header) of the httplib2 client accessingsaid server. This is fixed in version 0.19.0 which contains a newimplementation of auth headers parsing using the pyparsing library.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21240` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-httplib2 - 0.20.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-httplib2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.4-2').
